bio: Solitude's grandeur beckoned, and Min Cerafi, an Argonian mage necromancer, answered the call to master the forbidden arts. A practitioner of conjuration and destruction magic, her journey faced a morbid trial – a fear of the undead. Venturing into the Solitude catacombs, she embraced the shadows, emerging as a necromancer unafraid of the skeletal forces that lurked within.
name: Min Cerafi
